text: Wagontire Mountain is a summit in the U.S. state of Oregon. With an elevation of , Wagontire Mountain is the 435th highest summit in the state of Oregon. Wagontire Mountain was named for the fact passersby reported seeing an old wagon tire left upon the mountain. The unincorporated community of Wagontire was named after the mountain. ==References== Category:Landforms of Harney County, Oregon Category:Mountains of Lake County, Oregon Category:Mountains of Oregon
title: Wagontire Mountain
